name: NOAH'S ARKCADE
description:
Controls:

‘a’ & ‘d’ or left & right arrow keys for movement!

‘e’ key to scoop poop below deck & to shoot poop above deck!

Spacebar to jump!

Enter to select!

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42
www.zambo.fun

ZAMBONI MACARONI TEAM:
Taylor “Tweedle” Dunn
Joshua “Rockin” Waton
Stephen “Ropedog” Roper
Greg “Halfskye” Raab
